actions.text: Amendment SA 167 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 167 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S2941-2942; text: CR S2942) To express the sense of the Senate that the full amount of the President's request for the administrative costs of the Social Security Administration for fiscal year 2006 should be funded.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 167 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 167 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Baucus.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate that the full amount of the President's request for the administrative costs of the Social Security Administration for fiscal year 2006 should be funded.
